content: Connection is feeding my grown daughter chicken soup one salty sip at a time and giggling together when a noodle slides off the spoon and waggles on the tip of her perfect chin. She’s always so strong except for now when she’s so weak, so I feed her slowly. Then she vomits on my foot and she says she’s sorry, but I don’t care because she’s my child and we are connected and I would vomit for her if I could.
